A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very well done Star Wars film\, but definitely not what I expected. How it’s vastly different from Force Awakens (and most Star Wars films) was that this film largely isolated many of the main characters from each other for the majority of the film\, so it did feel somewhat scattered throughout the galaxy instead of the usual ensemble parading around in the Millennium Falcon. Otherwise\, The Last Jedi had great visuals\, exciting battles\, interesting plot twists\, and is a great continuation to the Star Wars saga that largely does its aging characters justice while continuing to build the new ones in interesting ways. My new Star Wars rankings are as follows: (from worst to best) Attack of the Clones\, Phantom Menace\, Revenge of the Sith\, Return of the Jedi\, Rogue One\, The Last Jedi\, Force Awakens\, A New Hope\, and Empire Strikes Back.
